datum: By the prayers of the Blessed Mary, always a Virgin, and by the prayers of all the Saints, * and for her sake and for their sakes, may the Lord lead us unto the kingdom of heaven.

lectio-i: Bless us, Mary, Maiden mild, * Bless us, Jesus, Maryâ€™s Child.
lectio-ii: With the Lord Who sprang of thee, * Maid of maidens, plead for me.
lectio-iii: Through the Virgin mother concede to us O Lord * safety and peace.
